code: import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{useRecoilValue}from"recoil";import{div}from"../../libs/math";import{format,formatAsset}from"../../libs/parse";import{percent}from"../../libs/num";import Table from"../../components/Table";import{useListedAssets}from"../../database/assets";import{infoQuery}from"../../database/info";var Helpers=function Helpers(){var listed=useListedAssets("listed");var info=useRecoilValue(infoQuery);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Table,{columns:[{key:"symbol",title:"Ticker",bold:true},{key:"MIRAnnualRewards",title:"MIR annual rewards",render:function render(value){return format(value);},align:"right"},{key:"MIRPrice",title:"MIR price",render:function render(value){return format(value);},align:"right"},{key:"liquidityValue",title:"Liquidity value",render:function render(value){return formatAsset(value,"UST",{integer:true});},align:"right"},{key:"stakedLpShare",title:"Staked LP share",render:function render(value){return formatAsset(value,"LP",{integer:true});},align:"right"},{key:"totalLpShare",title:"Total LP share",render:function render(value){return formatAsset(value,"LP",{integer:true});},align:"right"},{key:"ratio",title:"Staking ratio",render:function render(_,_ref){var stakedLpShare=_ref.stakedLpShare,totalLpShare=_ref.totalLpShare;return percent(div(stakedLpShare,totalLpShare));},align:"right"}],dataSource:listed.map(function(_ref2){var token=_ref2.token;return info[token].log;})});};export default Helpers;
